text: Harry Glickman (May 13, 1924 â€“ June 10, 2020) was an American journalist, promoter, and sports executive. He was one of the founders of the Portland Trail Blazers, and the team's president from 1987 to 1994. He was born in Portland, Oregon. He was also a sports editor for The Oregonian. On June 10, 2020, Glickman died in Portland at the age of 96. ==References== Category:1924 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Journalists from Oregon Category:Portland Trail Blazers Category:Sportspeople from Portland, Oregon Category:Writers from Portland, Oregon Category:Businesspeople from Portland, Oregon
title: Harry Glickman
